Hey Max,

I’m Vikas, a current grad student at UMBC, and I’m applying for a Data Scientist role at Meta. As a fellow UMBC alum, I’d love to get your take—would you be open to a referral? Happy to share my resume. Thanks!

Hey there sorry I only refer people who I have worked with before. I'm not on LI very much but feel free to message me with questions about Meta or anything else work related. Always happy to help a Retriever

Hi Collette,
 
I noticed Addison Group is hiring a Junior Data Analyst and the role sounds like a perfect fit for my background and interests.
 
 Data wrangling & quality: Built a Python/SQL pipeline that cleaned 10 k+ multilingual articles with 98 % accuracy and fed the results into Tableau dashboards.
 
 Insight‑driven visuals: Created reports that highlighted translation trends and boosted content quality by 20 %.
 
 Cross‑functional teamwork: At EPAM Systems I automated data‑driven test pipelines in Agile sprints, improving deployment reliability by 30 %.
 
 Growth mindset: My current research at UMBC applies transformers and ConvLSTM models to EEG & facial data, translating complex signals into clear insights.
 
I’m passionate about turning messy data into meaningful stories—exactly what your posting calls for—and would love to discuss how I could contribute to Addison Group’s clients.
 
Could we schedule a quick call next week? I’ve attached my résumé for context, and my profile showcases additional projects.
 
Thanks for your time, Collette!
 
Best,
Vikas Reddy
M.S. Data Science | UMBC
📞 443‑992‑2554
 vikasreddy0705@gmail.com

Hi Nino,
 
I came across your post about hiring software engineers for the sovereign clouds team at Microsoft, and I’m very excited about this opportunity. I bring experience in software development and machine learning from both research and industry, including my time at UMBC as a Research Assistant and at EPAM Systems as a Software Development Engineer in Test.
 
The chance to contribute to the future of sovereign clouds deeply resonates with my passion for solving complex problems and building impactful solutions. I’d love the opportunity to connect and explore how my background aligns with your team’s goals.
